Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or

Tom Stoffel  swings at a pitch against Georgia Tech April   PERIOD

Quality wins against ranked opponents is something Virginia Tech baseball has had some experience with this season PERIOD While things havent gone smoothly all season the Hokies have played well at times when facing ranked teams PERIOD That was the case on Tuesday when Virginia Tech defeated No PERIOD  Old Dominion at Harbor Park to close out the nonconference part of their schedule PERIOD

After throwing . innings on Sunday Nick Anderson made an abbreviated start for the Hokies PERIOD The redshirt junior only went three innings before handing the ball over to Dylan Hall PERIOD Anderson only allowed two hits and struck out two PERIOD

Virginia Tech senior third baseman Matt Dauby got the Hokies on the board in the fourth against Monarchs reliever Morgan Maguire  PERIOD His single scored Tom Stoffel and Sam Fragale PERIOD

Old Dominion answered in the home half of the frame PERIOD Trailing  Culver Lamb hit a tworun home run off of Hall and Virginia Tech trailed  PERIOD

The Hokies took the lead for good in the fifth PERIOD Maguire hit Jack Owens with one out and that brought up Stoffel PERIOD The No PERIOD  hitter took a  pitch and deposited it over the right field wall giving Tech a  lead PERIOD Stoffel went  on the afternoon PERIOD

Stoffels home run was No PERIOD  for the Hokies PERIOD Thats the most they have hit in a season since joining the ACC PERIOD The school record is  which was set in  PERIOD

In the sixth inning Virginia Tech catcher Marcus White tripled to center and Rahiem Cooper scored from first making it  PERIOD

The Monarchs would get a run on a sacrifice fly in the sixth to trim the deficit to one but the Hokies offense had another answer in their next at bat PERIOD

After loading the bases against Craig Lopez the Hokies pushed a run across on a Mac Caples RBI single PERIOD Cooper followed with a sacrifice fly that scored Stoffel and it was  PERIOD Cooper had a gamehigh three hits PERIOD

Hall  followed the scoring up with a shutdown inning PERIOD He retired the last eight hitters he faced and earned his first collegiate win PERIOD His . innings came up huge for Virginia Tech who used six different pitchers on Sunday PERIOD

Paul Hall Jr PERIOD and Joey Sullivan finished the game off and Virginia Tech added a run in the eighth to win  PERIOD Virginia Tech improved to  on the season while Old Dominion fell to  PERIOD The Hokies finished  in nonconference games PERIOD

Head coach Patrick Mason and his team will travel to Miami later this week for a three game set beginning on Thursday at  p.m PERIOD Miamis pitching staff ranks fifth in the ACC in terms of ERA . pERIOD The offense is a different story as the Hurricanes only hit . as a team PERIOD That is the lowest amongst ACC teams PERIOD

The Hokies are in a tight battle for one of the final spots in the ACC Tournament PERIOD Pittsburgh and Boston College are on the outside looking in but only trail the Hokies by a game in the ACC PERIOD Pittsburgh owns the tiebreaker over Virginia Tech PERIOD As of now Virginia Tech would be the twelfth and final seed PERIOD
